item.description:
Celebrating Women’s Health, Beauty and Wellness
Tuesday, March 20, 2012 6 pm – 9 pm
Tuscan Kitchen, 67 Main Street, Salem, NH
Includes a Networking Reception and Buffet

Special Guest Speaker Erica Giblin, MD
Board-Certified General Surgeon and Breast Specialist
Women’s Health: 10 Myths to Ignore, 10 Facts to Follow
Dr. Giblin helps you separate fact from fiction so you
have the knowledge and know-how to stay healthy.

Free Evening for Women
REGISTER TODAY

Meet with our female entrepreneurs and
spring into a new you:
• Maureen Campaiola, Money Mentor to Women
Who Are Ready to Increase their Income!
• Terrie Bulger, Fitness and Health Expert, 180 Fitness
• Susan Kanoff, Fashion Coach, A Great New Look
• Addie Kania, Holistic Hypnotherapist
• Pauline Alighieri, Friends of Mel
• Cheri Valentine, Dating, Mating and Relationship Expert
• Marcia Griffith, Rodan and Fields Skin Care

 

Bra Specialist Shelly Mangougian from Bella Intimates will be on hand to discuss your bra needs and will offer free bra fittings at her store in NH.

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: Fit and Fabulous Event
